ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Not true.  We got jumped by a Spectral Knight in Karnor s last night at zone.  Always fun to have a level 51 mob that can summon (conned yellow to me and white
ygData.messageBody:
Not true. We got jumped by a Spectral Knight in Karnor's last night at zone. Always fun to have a level
51 mob that can summon (conned yellow to me and white to the other level 51 bard in the party) trained to
zone. It kept summoning people back to it as they ran for zone. Not a pretty picture. The level 51
bard and I took turns charming it to cover everyone's escape. While I did get more resists then I'm used
to, the level 39 song certainly did stick and had our cleric not gone down from the initial train, we
probably would have stuck it out and used it as a pet.

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 50th Song
Prexus

>
> Level 39 song...soon worthless as we start fighting mobs above level 49, but
> i use the hell out of it now.
